characters.story: The I-beam and ordinary leather bend down drooping to strengthen, consolidate, and fortify the structure.
"BAH!" the weather commands sharply - a tyrant, a despot who dominates!
"BAH!" the soil and tyrant command sharply - building a dam, embankment, and barrier!
"LUH!" the muscle commands sharply - to tighten, strangle, and constrict!
"JYOO!" the leather and rice sing cheerfully as he bows respectfully, kowtowing and saluting!
"SHWEH!" the leather transforms and sings cheerfully - boots, shoes, and footwear!
"BYEN!" the leather sings cheerfully when convenient - a whip to lash and strike!
"YAH?" the flowers question curiously - is this a sprout, a seedling, or bean shoots?
"YAH!" the words and tusk command sharply - surprised, stunned, and astonished!
"CHUNG!" the fingers sing cheerfully as they prop up, support, and hold the tent!
The tusk and turkey bend down drooping - polished, elegant, and refined in the room before goodbye.
"SHYEH?" the tusk and city walls question curiously - is that wicked, evil with a sinister laugh?
"AO!" the drop, helmet, and droppings command sharply - of great depth, profound, and mysterious!
"AO!" the water commands sharply - a deep inlet, a bay, and harbor!
"AO!" the state of mind commands sharply about the depth - remorseful, regretful, and ashamed!
"SHEE!" the heart sings cheerfully - to be informed, to know, and to learn!
"CHYEH!" the hole, droppings, magic wand, prisoner, and glass cover command sharply - to pilfer and steal like a thief!
The house bends down drooping with painstaking care - to examine with aesthetics.
